note.p: Rabbit fancier and professor of music. From Yorkshire. Wrote books on keeping rabbits.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/3973/69/49)
Correspondence vol. 20, letter from Francis Galton, [24 March 1872]
